column6: When Shevaun Haldane experiences a troubling vision in Darkmoor Castle, she realizes danger may be coming for the heroes of Marvel UK. With time running out, Shevaun has no choice but to suit up as Dark Angel once again. An adventure that will take fans through the past, present, and future of Marvel UK!
column8: | writer:Kieron Gillen | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | artist:Dietrich Smith
